data.actual_result: Any letters, numbers, or other valid characters you type will be entered into the message box.
data.expected_result: Nothing is entered into the message box while the menu is open.
data.short_description: When the message box is selected, typing while in the keyboard combos menu still types into the message box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Select the message box by clicking on it so that the flashing typing cursor appears - Press [Ctrl + /] - Begin typing or attempt to use keyboard combos
